recipe.title: Chili-Lime Dressing
ingredients: *Available at Asian markets and in the Asian foods section of some supermarkets.
instructions: Whisk lime juice, soy sauce, chili oil, sugar and garlic in medium bowl to blend. Season dressing to taste with pepper. (Can be made 6 hours ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
